# Seaside Prefabs

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/seaside-prefabs-in-fortnite-creative>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:11:08.488568

---

All **Seaside** [prefabs](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#prefab) share general [themes](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#island-theme) of structures you might find on coastal [terrains](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#terrain).

On the **Prefabs** [category](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#category), you can browse for prefabricated building structures and the pieces they are made of. You can search by [category](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#category), or by prefab name (shown below).

This page is a visual guide to help you find prefabs that fit this theme more quickly.

To learn more about how to place and manipulate prefabs, and even how to use prefabs to build new environments that are uniquely your own, check out [Building Basics](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/building-basics-in-fortnite-creative).

## Coral Castle Category

|  |  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [Coral Castle Tower](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/524deb3c-e47a-4ec5-9b50-d22652ee4fa3?resizing_type=fit) | [Coral Castle Gatehouse](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/3bd10dd4-8b86-4c82-be4d-da817f0d7055?resizing_type=fit) | [Coral Castle Chamberhouse](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/91c0614c-f652-49a0-8365-396d330010e0?resizing_type=fit) | [Coral Castle Center](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/1f8fa494-6c49-4b76-a2d4-83961d109e91?resizing_type=fit) | [Coral Castle Bridgeway](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ce555455-7d20-4432-a6a8-a7a494d09fe9?resizing_type=fit) |
| **Coral Castle Tower** | **Coral Castle Gatehouse** | **Coral Castle Chamberhouse** | **Coral Castle Center** | **Coral Castle Bridgeway** |
